entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
